snippet: Empire BlueCross BlueShield has promised a cash payment that would be the equivalent of three weeks of coverage to New York customers whose insurance cards were delayed.
abstract: Empire Blue Cross Blue Shield has promised cash payment equivalent to three weeks of coverage to New York customers whose insurance cards were delayed.
